<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon preached at Pauls crosse on Trinity sunday, 1571. By E.B. Bush, Edward. Bunny, Edmund, 1540-1619.
[64] p.
by Iohn Awdely, Imprinted at London : 1576.
E.B. = Edward Bush. Sometimes attributed to Edmund Bunny. Signatures: A-H⁴. Running title reads: A sermon preached at Paules Crosse. Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
=======

by Iohn Awdely, Imprinted at London : 1576.
